org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util

Class RowColBloomContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.BloomContext
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.RowColBloomContext

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class RowColBloomContext
extends BloomContext
    Handles ROWCOL bloom related context. It can work with both BytebufferdCells and byte[] backed cells
